title: SELF-IMMOLATION COULD HAVE BEEN PREVENTED – Media Sec.
content: Mass Media and Information Ministry Secretary Dr. Charitha Herath Mass Media and Information Minister Keheliya Rambukwella yesterday said his ministry has launched a special investigation into the death of Ven. Bowatte Indrarathana Thera, by self-immolation opposite the Dalada Maligawa….
